example.en: The clock of history, like the sands of the hourglass, marks the passage of time.
example.vi: Biên sử, giống như cát trong chiếc đồng hồ cát, đánh dấu thời gian đang trôi qua.

example.en: The clock of history, like the sands of the hourglass, marks the passage of time.
